EnumerableOptionCallback  
 

Class Summary
BooleanOption  
Config Global configuration object for a node.
ConfigCallback<T>

PersistentConfig Config but supports an initial SimpleFieldSet, from which options are drawn.

StringOption  
SubConfig A specific configuration block.

Enum Summary
Config.RequestType  
Option.DataType  
 

Exception Summary
ConfigException Usefull if you want to catch all exceptions the config framework can return;
InvalidConfigValueException Thrown when the node refuses to set a config variable to a particular value because it is invalid.
NodeNeedRestartException Thrown when the node must be restarted for a config setting to be applied.
OptionFormatException Thrown when a format error occurs, and we cannot parse the string set into the appropriate type.
